buffer (17 of 36 overloads)

Create a new modifiable buffer that represents the given POD array. 

template<
    typename PodType,
    std::size_t N>
mutable_buffer buffer(
    std::array< PodType, N > & data);
Return Value

A mutable_buffer value equivalent to: 

mutable_buffer(
    data.data(),
    data.size() * sizeof(PodType));
